ygData.subject: RE: Water staff at lake
ygData.msgSnippet: Err, didnt I mention it s a LORE item?  ie 1 WCS per char at all time.  So kakis will have to loot it themselves. Lake Rathetear is a hunting place for min 18
ygData.messageBody:
Err, didnt I mention it's a LORE item? ie 1 WCS per char at all time. So
kakis will have to loot it themselves.

Lake Rathetear is a hunting place for min 18 (tank in grp) or 20 (caster in
grp). Kinda risky for those below 18, esp if u need to swim in the lake
for 90% of the traveling.

There is a 1-3% chance u will meet Webbie or Prince in water, but often I
see large fresh water shark, croc, aqua goblin and froglok in water. This
can be fatal esp when ya swiming skill is low.

As for spec, I dunno if there is a cap other than lvl ceiling. I think the
one with the high skill shld be the REAL spec. So far all my spec are
still rising. Evoke, been the most commonly casted spells for wiz, is for
sure the highest and my REAL spec ;)



On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 1:37 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> it is rumored that the staff is part of a quest for a bigger better
staff...
> so its good to get a few... give to local kakis n all ya wiz char since
its
> one-handed and its better than a cracked staff...
>
> btw... i put 1 point in each and every specialisation (20 to start with i
> think)... all of thm increase... but is there a limit to one of them? if
so
> when? otherwise then how do u determind which one u specialised?
>
> cheers,
> Nicademous
